briefTitle: Providing Free Nicotine Patches to Quitline Smokers

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years or older
* Current smoker
* First time quitline caller
* Not eligible for nicotine patches through other programs such as MediCal or Los Angeles County which provides free nicotine patches
* English and/or Spanish speaking
* Valid phone number
* Valid address
* CA resident
* Gave consent to participate in study and evaluation

Exclusion Criteria:

* Contraindication(s) to nicotine patches
* Uses a form of tobacco other than cigarettes
* Plans to use Chantix

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Six Months Prolonged Abstinence
outcomeMeasures.description: At seven months post enrollment we will conduct a brief telephone survey to assess smoking status. The information obtained will allow us to determine six month prolonged abstinence rates.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Smokers Making a 24-hour Quit Attempt
outcomeMeasures.description: At the follow up evaluation, subjects will be asked if they have made a quit attempt that lasted at least 24 hours.
